text: Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Fan zai mi wu zhong zhe, pu ci zhi zhu [an la] jiang [zhanshi] yan kuan tamen de shouming, zhidao tamen kanjian tamen suo bei xunuo de: Bushi xingfa jiushi fuhuo de shijian, na shi tamen jiang zhidao shei di diwei zui elie, shei de liliang zui ruanruo [zhe shi dui di 73 jie jing wen de dafu].”
